title: Lassen Volcanic National Park: Park Home
body: Explore the Undiscovered  Lassen Volcanic National Park is home to steaming fumaroles, meadows freckled with wildflowers, clear mountain lakes, and numerous volcanoes. Jagged peaks tell the story of its eruptive past while hot water continues to shape the land. Lassen Volcanic offers opportunities to discover the wonder and mysteries of volcanoes and hot water for visitors willing to explore the undiscovered. Read More               Lassen Dark Sky Festival 8/12-8/14   Enjoy Lassen's dark night skies in solitude or join others at the annual Lassen Dark Sky Festival.         Celebrate with Centennial Events   Celebrate Lassen Volcanic's 100th anniversary with special events throughout 2016.              Enjoy Free Entrance 8/25 - 8/28   Enjoy Free Entrance for the National Park Service's birthday weekend beginning on Founder's Day 8/25.        Centennial Parkcaching Challenge   Use your GPS-enabled device to learn more about the park and earn a free commemorative carabiner.        New Then and Now Roadside Audio Tour   Travel through time with this narrated tour of the 30-mile park highway.              Plan Your Summer Visit   Make the most out of your summer trip and plan ahead.        Discover the Otherwordly   Explore one of the many hydrothermal (hot water) areas in the park including Bumpass Hell and Devils Kitchen.        View Current Conditions   Check road conditions, snow depths, the weather forecast, and webcams.
